alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing one or more chlorine atoms attached to a benzene moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Chlorobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic derivatives of thiophosphonic acid, thiophosphoric acid, dithiophosphoric acid, or phosphorotrithioic acid, or derivatives thereof. Thiophosphonic acid, dithiophosphoric acid, thiophosphoric acid, and phosphorotrithioic acid are thiophosphorus compounds with the formula OP(O)(=S), OP(S)(=S)O, OP(O)(=S)O, and OP(=S)(S)S, respectively.
alternative_parents.name: Organothiophosphorus compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as phenoxy compounds. These are aromatic compounds contaning a phenoxy group.

direct_parent.description: Aromatic compounds contaning a phenoxy group.
direct_parent.name: Phenoxy compounds

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Aromatic compounds contaning a phenoxy group.
subclass.name: Phenoxy compounds

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
